iati-activity.title: Equitable and sustainable access to WASH
iati-activity.description: This project will address WASH problems by increasing water, sanitation and hygiene (WASH) coverage contributing towards reaching the MDGs on water and sanitation, in all the 5 districts. Over the 3 years, It will enable over 19,571 community members to access safe water through the construction of
